definition: to catch sight of in a doorway (old)
board/plank/plate/shutter/table tennis bat/clappers (music)/CL:塊|块[kuai4]/accented beat in Chinese music/hard/stiff/to stop smiling or look serious

sentences.english: They call vividly this plate - type tool it the capture board .
sentences.chinese: 他们将这个板状工具形象地称之为“捕获板”。

sentences.english: Typically the rock is massive , but commonly it is flaggy or schistose .
sentences.chinese: 这类岩石典型地呈块状，但常呈薄板状或片理化。

sentences.english: The plate-shaped transparent member overlies a display screen.
sentences.chinese: 板状透明构件叠加在显示屏上。

sentences.english: Single sand body occurs generally as tabular mass or wide lens.
sentences.chinese: 单砂体多呈板状和宽透镜状。

sentences.english: They hold pieces of paper, sometimes laminated.
sentences.chinese: 他们拿着许多纸，有时候是薄板状的。

sentences.english: Scientists do not know what the bony plates on the back of the Stegosaurus were for.
sentences.chinese: 科学家们不知道剑龙背上的这些板状的骨头有什么用。

sentences.english: The flow-induced vibration of a plate-type beam structure with nonlinear support is studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了受非线性支承的板状梁结构流致振动问题。

sentences.english: A kind of washboard-like crack on steel plate surface is introduced.
sentences.chinese: 文章介绍钢板表面产生的一种搓板状裂纹。

sentences.english: Hence a new type of plate-sieve device has been developed.
sentences.chinese: 通过试验研究，文章提出了一种新的板状筛孔装置。

sentences.english: A kind of washboard - like crack on steel plate surface is introduced.
sentences.chinese: 文章介绍钢板表面产生的一种搓板状裂纹。

sentences.english: The bottom base is fixed on a tubular or platy fixture and then the hospital stand for infusion can be used.
sentences.chinese: 底座固定在管状或板状的固定物上，便可使用。

sentences.english: Some buttress roots extend for several meters outward from the trunk at ground level.
sentences.chinese: 一些板状根在地面上方延伸数米。

sentences.english: It has rounded shoulders inside instead of the sharp orifice - like edge.
sentences.chinese: 在内部作成圆形凸肩以代替锐缘孔板状的侧面。

definition: a block/body of person or animal as a block
